row.name: Bing Ads UET Tag
row.description: Adds the Bing Ads Universal Event Tracking Tag to your website so you can apply conversion tracking to your Bing ad campaigns.
row.help: The tag tracks what your customers are doing after they click on your Bing ad.

row.name: bingAdID
row.title: ID
row.description: You can find the Bing Ad ID when creating a new tracking code in the Bing Ad Campaign Manager.

row.name: Matomo Analytics
row.description: Matomo is the leading open source analytics platform.
row.help: This tag lets you track pageviews and events into your Matomo. You can customize the tracking to your needs.

row.name: matomoConfig
row.title: Matomo Configuration
row.description: Assign a Matomo configuration in order to track data into a specific site.

row.name: trackingType
row.title: Tracking Type

availableValues.initialise: Initialise tracker only. Don't track anything.

row.description: Choose which action should be executed when this tag is fired.

row.name: idGoal
row.title: Goal ID
row.description: The ID of the goal you want to track manually.

row.name: goalCustomRevenue
row.title: Goal Revenue (optional)
row.description: The estimated revenue value to track when the goal is triggered manually. As this value will be used in a calculation, it must either be a numeric value or it must reference a variable that contains a numeric value. If this field is empty or references a variable that doesn't contain a valid numeric value, the value will default to the revenue configured as part of the goal being triggered. A valid numeric value is something like 2430 or 2430.00 (note the absence of commas).

row.name: documentTitle
row.title: Custom Title
row.description: Optionally, specify a custom document title which should be tracked instead of the default document title.

row.name: customUrl
row.title: Custom URL
row.description: Optionally, specify a custom URL which should be tracked instead of the current location.

row.name: eventCategory
row.title: Event Category
row.description: The event's category, for example Videos, Music, Games…

row.name: eventAction
row.title: Event Action
row.description: The event's action, for example Play, Pause, Duration, Add Playlist, Downloaded, Clicked…

row.name: eventName
row.title: Event Name
row.description: The event's object Name, for example a particular Movie name, or Song name, or File name…

row.name: eventValue
row.title: Event Value
row.description: The event's value, for example "50" as in user has stayed on the website for 50 seconds.

row.name: Emarsys
row.description: Emarsys is the largest independent marketing platform in the world.
row.help: This tag adds the asynchronous Emarsys Code to your website.

row.name: merchantId
row.title: Emarsys Merchant ID
row.description: Your Emarsys Merchant ID

row.name: commandCategory
row.title: category
row.description: Report the category currently browsed by the visitor.

row.name: commandView
row.title: view
row.description: Report a product view.

row.name: commandTag
row.title: tag
row.description: Add an arbitrary tag to the current event. The tag is collected and can be accessed later from other Emarsys products.

row.name: commandGo
row.title: go
row.description: Execute commands in the queue, that is, send them to the recommender service for processing.

row.name: Google Analytics (Universal)
row.description: Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google.
row.help: This tag lets you track website pageviews into your Google Analytics. To obtain the Property-ID please log in to your Google Analytics account.

row.name: propertyId
row.title: Property ID
row.description: For example "UA-XXXXX-Y"

row.name: trackingType
row.title: Tracking Type
row.description: Only the tracking type "Pageview" is currently supported.

row.name: Pingdom Real User Monitoring (RUM)
row.description: Pingdom Real User Monitoring (RUM) lets you collect performance data from actual visitors to your site.
row.help: This tag allows you to add the Pingdom Real User Monitoring (RUM) to your site.

row.name: pingdomROMId
row.title: Pingdom RUM Site ID
row.description: You can get the Site ID by logging into Pingdom, going to "Monitoring" and clicking on "Real User Monitoring". Every added site will get its own Site ID.

row.name: Visual Website Optimizer
row.description: Visual Website Optimizer is an all-in-one A/B testing and Conversion Optimization Platform.
row.help: This tag adds the asynchronous VWO Smart Code to your website.

row.name: accountId
row.title: Visual Website Optimizer Account ID
row.description: Your Visual Website Optimizer Account ID

row.name: etracker web analysis
row.description: etracker is a web analytics system, you can choose to send a pageview or an event.

row.name: trackingType
row.title: Tracking Type
row.description: Choose which action should be executed when this tag is fired.

row.name: etrackerConfig
row.title: etracker Configuration
row.description: Assign a etracker configuration in order to track data into a specific site.

row.name: etrackerWrapperPagename
row.title: etracker Wrapper pagename (et_pagename)
row.description: The wrappers's pagename

row.name: etrackerWrapperArea
row.title: etracker Wrapper area (et_area)
row.description: The area should be separated by Slash

row.name: etrackerEventCategory
row.title: etracker Category
row.description: The event's category, for example Navigation, Outbound Links, 404 Error…

row.name: etrackerEventObject
row.title: etracker Object
row.description: The event's object Name, for example a particular navigation element, a clicked element, form name,…

row.name: etrackerEventAction
row.title: etracker Action
row.description: The event's action, for example, click, open, close, play, pause…

row.name: etrackerEventType
row.title: etracker Type
row.description: The event's type Name, for example an value of a send form…

row.name: etrackerTransactionType
row.title: etracker Order Status
row.description: Sale / Lead / Partial Cancellation / Cancellation

row.name: etrackerTransactionID
row.title: etracker Order number
row.description: Order ID, transaction id or similar - max 50 chars

row.name: etrackerTransactionValue
row.title: Order Value
row.description: Order Value

row.name: etrackerTransactionCurrency
row.title: Currency
row.description: Currency of the order according to ISO 4217 e.g.: EUR or USD

row.name: etrackerTransactionBasket
row.title: Basket
row.description: dataLayer object of basket - according to etracker reference

row.name: etrackerTransactionCustomerGroup
row.title: Customer Group
row.description: optional, e.g. new customer, existing customer, big buyer, VIP

row.name: etrackerTransactionDeliveryConditions
row.title: Delivery Conditions
row.description: optional, e.g. Delivery to the kerb, Setup on site, Delivery to the pick-up station/parcel shop/branch

row.name: etrackerTransactionPaymentConditions
row.title: Payment Conditions
row.description: optional, e.g. Special payment targets, Cash discount, Payment in instalments

row.name: etrackerAddToCartProduct
row.title: Product object
row.description: dataLayer object of the product - according to etracker reference

row.name: etrackerAddToCartNumber
row.title: Number
row.description: Number of products added to the cart

row.name: etrackerFormType
row.title: etracker Form Type
row.description: Conversion / Form View / Field View / Field Interaction / Field Error

row.name: etrackerFormName
row.title: Form Name
row.description: Form Name titles the report of the form which is tracked

row.name: etrackerFormData
row.title: Form Data
row.description: eg. form section information. If used, a string is required

row.name: Custom HTML
row.description: Allows you to embed any custom HTML, for example JavaScript or CSS Styles.
row.help: The Custom HTML tag allows you to embed any tag which is not supported yet. The possibilities with this tag are pretty much unlimited.

row.name: customHtml
row.title: Custom HTML
row.description: This tag is ideal when you need to add for example custom styles or custom JavaScript or when you are looking for a specific tag which is not yet supported. With this tag you can append any HTML to the bottom of your page, add styles, or execute JavaScript. Note: You can replace content within the HTML with variables by putting a variable name in curly brackets like this {{PageUrl}}.

row.name: htmlPosition
row.title: Position
row.description: Define the position of where the HTML should be inserted into your website.

row.name: Custom Image
row.description: Allows you to embed any image, for example a tracking pixel.
row.help: This tag allows you to add for example a transparent tracking pixel into your website.

row.name: customImageSrc
row.title: Image URL
row.description: You can define any image URL. We recommend to define a URL that starts with "//" so it will work on HTTP and HTTPS pages. If your website only supports HTTPS, it should start with "https://".

row.name: cacheBusterEnabled
row.title: Enable Cache Buster
row.description: Makes sure the image will be fetched again every time it is added to the page by adding a URL parameter to the image URL with a random value, for example "?mtmcb=12345"..

row.name: Bugsnag
row.description: Add error monitoring to your applications with Bugsnag.
row.help: This tag adds the default bugsnag javascript integration to your website.

row.name: apiKey
row.title: API key
row.description: You can find your API key in your project settings from your Bugsnag dashboard.

row.name: collectUserIp
row.title: collect user IP
row.description: This should be disable if you don't want to track personal information about your users.

row.name: Honeybadger
row.description: Exception and Uptime Monitoring for Application Developers
row.help: This tag adds the official Honeybadger Javascript SDK to your website.

row.name: honeybadgerApiKey
row.title: Honeybadger apiKey
row.description: The apiKey of your honeybadger project

row.name: honeybadgerEnvironment
row.title: Environment
row.description: The environment where the container is included (production, dev, etc.). Leave empty to default to the environment of this container.

row.name: honeybadgerRevision
row.title: Code Revision
row.description: (optional) the version of your project

row.name: Raygun
row.description: Error, crash and performance monitoring software.
row.help: This tag adds the official raygun4js SDK to your website.

row.name: raygunApiKey
row.title: Raygun apiKey
row.description: When you create a new application in your Raygun dashboard, your app API key is displayed at the top of the instructions page. You can also find the API key by clicking the "Application Settings" button in the side bar of the Raygun dashboard.

row.name: raygunEnablePulse
row.title: Enable Pulse (Real User Monitoring)
row.description: Automatically identify front end performance issues causing slow page load speeds. See what your users see in the browser and discover why users had poor quality experiences.

row.name: Sentry.io Raven.js
row.description: Sentry.io is an Open-Source error tracking tool that allows you to detect errors that happen on your website.
row.help: This tag adds Raven.js, the official Javascript SDK. Get started by signing up on sentry.io or setting up your own tracking instance.

row.name: sentryDSN
row.title: Sentry.io DSN
row.description: The DSN (Data Source Name) of your sentry.io project. It should look like 'https://<key>@sentry.io/<project>'

row.name: AddThis
row.description: Add the AddThis social media buttons and more to your website.

row.name: AddThisPubId
row.title: AddThis PubId
row.description: Create a new site in Shareaholic and paste the site ID here

row.name: AddThisParentSelector
row.title: Inline Tools Parent Selector
row.description: Optionally enter a CSS selector to the element where the Inline Tools should be added.

row.name: Drift
row.description: Discover more efficient placement of your bots with Drift JavaScript tags.

row.name: driftId
row.title: Drift ID
row.description: The Drift ID is the text between brackets without quotes at the end of the JS snippet: drift.load('mdp4r5w7rh3y');

row.name: Facebook Pixel
row.description: The Facebook Pixel is a web analytics and advertising service offered by Facebook.
row.help: This tag lets you track website pageviews in your Facebook Ads account. To obtain the Pixel ID please log in to your Facebook Ads account.

row.name: LinkedIn Insight Tag
row.description: Adds the LinkedIn Insight Tag so you can apply conversion tracking to your LinkedIn ad campaigns.
row.help: The tag will enable detailed campaign reporting and information about your website visitors in LinkedIn. It allows you to track conversions, retarget website visitors, and gain additional insights about LinkedIn members that interact with your LinkedIn ads.

row.name: partnerId
row.title: LinkedIn Partner ID
row.description: You can find the partner ID by logging into your LinkedIn Campaign Manager, and clicking on "Account Assets" followed by "Insight Tag". If "Insight Tag" is not available, please set up the Insight Tag by clicking on "Conversion Tracking". There you can enter a domain and continue the set up. You will find the partner ID in the line `_linkedin_partner_id = "123456"`. In this example the ID would be "123456".

row.name: Livezilla Chat / Monitoring
row.description: Livezilla lets you monitor and chat with visitors on your website.
row.help: This tag allows you to add the Dynamic Code integration from Livezilla to Chat with you Customers or just Monitor your website.

row.name: LivezillaDynamicID
row.title: Livezilla ID
row.description: Insert the Livezilla ID from your Dynamic Code section.

row.name: LivezillaDynamicDomain
row.title: Livezilla Domain
row.description: Enter the Domain where Livezilla is installed. Example: https://www.example.com

row.name: LivezillaDynamicDefer
row.title: Livezilla Script "defer"?
row.description: In most cases you should let it activated.

row.name: Shareaholic
row.description: Content Marketing Platform & Website Traffic Tools
row.help: This tag lets you add Shareaholic social media buttons and more to your website.

row.name: shareaholicSiteId
row.title: Shareaholic Site ID
row.description: Create a new site in Shareaholic and paste the site ID here

row.name: shareaholicInPageApp
row.title: Shareaholic In-Page App
row.description: Here you can optionally add an In-Page App to your website.

row.name: shareaholicAppId
row.title: In-Page App ID
row.description: If you want to add an In-Page App enter the App ID here. It is about eight digits long. The App ID is not required for the Total Share Counter.

row.name: shareaholicParentSelector
row.title: In-Page App Parent Selector
row.description: Enter a CSS selector to the element where the In-Page App should be added.

row.name: Tawk.to
row.description: Tawk.to lets you monitor and chat with visitors on your website.
row.help: This tag allows you to add the Tawk.to contact form to your website.

row.name: tawkToId
row.title: tawk.to Site ID
row.description: You can get the Site ID by logging into Tawk.to, going to "Administration" and clicking on "Property Settings". The Site ID has typically about 25 characters, for example "123451c27295ad739e46b6b1".

row.name: tawkToWidgetId
row.title: tawk.to Widget ID
row.description: You can get the Widget ID by logging into Tawk.to, going to "Administration" and clicking on "Chat Widget" and selecting an appropriate widget. The widget ID can be retrieved from "Direct Chat Link" as https://tawk.to/chat/{SITE_ID}/{WIDGET_ID}.

row.name: Zendesk Chat (formerly Zopim)
row.description: Reach your customers, instantly via web, mobile, and messaging.
row.help: This tag allows you to add the Zendesk Chat form to your website.

row.name: zendeskChatId
row.title: Zendesk Chat ID
row.description: You can get the Site ID by logging into Zendesk Chat, going to "Settings" and clicking on "Widget". The Site ID has typically about 32 characters and is the text coming directly after "https://v2.zopim.com/?", for example "123451c27295ad739e46b6b1".

row.name: Theme Color
row.description: Style the UI of supported browsers.
row.help: This tag supports Chrome on Android and other browser that understand 'theme-color'.

row.name: themeColor
row.title: Theme Color
row.description: Please enter a color as a hexadecimal string (e.g. '#11ee33')
